title: New: Osca – Around The Bends
content:
London quartet Osca sound like they want to be the biggest band in the world, and with their track record to date, there’s no reason why they can’t be.

From the Sky Sports featured Blood, to Hype Machine hit Illume, alongside latest offering, Around The Bends, they pen epic, rousing anthems at their very first. This is essentially the song that Coldplay forgot to include on Mylo Xyloto. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
